p.name: The Report of the French Commission on Yellow Fever
Studien űber Gelbfiebes in Parasilien

bibl.title: Postcard from William H. Welch to Howard A. Kelly, December 4, 1905

div1.p: Welch provides journal article references on yellow fever.

div1.head: Postcard from William H. Welch to Howard A. Kelly, December 4, 1905
div1.opener:
Ac
Va
Dec. 4, 1905.
807 St. Paul W.
div1.p:
The Report of the French Commission on Yellow Fever (for
which Dr. Latimer asked the reference) is in the 'Annales
de l'Institut Pasteur', 1903, T. xvii, p. 665.

You may be interested also in the elaborate paper
by Otto and Neumann, 'Studien űber Gelbfieber in
Parasilien' in the last number of 'Leitschrift fűur
Hygiene u. Infectious krankheiten, Bd. L.i, Hft. 3,
p. 357.
THE SPACE ABOVE IS RESERVED FOR POSTMARK
THE SPACE BELOW IS FOR THE ADDRESS ONLY.

Dr. H. A. Kelly,
1418 Eutaw Place,
Baltimore.
